itemLabel: Peter Hardy, Baron Hardy of Wath

wikipedia_page.main: Peter Hardy, Baron Hardy of Wath  (16 July 1931 – 16 December 2003) was a British Labour politician.

response: *Peter Hardy, Baron Hardy of Wath (1931–2003), longstanding local Labour MP, was born and educated in Wath.
*Peter Hardy, Baron Hardy of Wath (1931–2003), English politician
* Peter Hardy, Baron Hardy of Wath (1931–2003), British Labour Party politician
